headline: Why The Mondelez (MDLZ) Story Is Shifting As Guidance Holds And Valuations Reset
summary: Mondelez International’s fair value estimate has been nudged from US$66.69 to US$66.92, pointing to a very small reset in the modeled price target. Around the 2026 CAGNY conference, analysts framed this type of fine tuning against a mixed but generally constructive sector view, with Mondelez often cited as holding steadier guidance than several large U.S. food peers. As you read on, you will see how these measured price target moves fit into the broader story and how you can track the next...
